```{r}
library(surveydown)
library(hitop)

items <- read.csv("pid_items.csv")

options <- c(
  "Very False or Often False" = "0",
  "Sometimes or Somewhat False" = "1",
  "Sometimes or Somewhat True" = "2",
  "Very True or Often True" = "3"
)
```

::: {#welcome .sd-page}

# Welcome to our survey!

Welcome! You will be asked to complete a series of questions about your mental health.

```{r}
sd_next()
```

:::

::: {#page2 .sd-page}

```{r}
# Select version
version <- "PID5BF"

# Filter version items
vitems <- items[!is.na(items[[version]]), ]

# Loop through version items
shiny::tagList(
  lapply(
    1:nrow(vitems), 
    \(i) sd_question(
      id = sprintf("bf_%03d", vitems[[i, version]]),
      type = "mc",
      label = vitems[[i, "Stem"]],
      option = options
    )
  ),
  sd_next(label = "Show Results")
)
```

:::
